en.title: Pythagorean Theorem Calculator
en.seoTitle: Pythagorean Theorem Calculator - Calculate Right Triangle Sides Online
en.metaDescription: Free Pythagorean theorem calculator. Calculate the missing side of a right triangle using a² + b² = c². Step-by-step solutions for geometry problems.
keywords: a squared plus b squared equals c squared
longTailKeywords: find missing side of right triangle
en.summary: Calculate missing sides of right triangles using the Pythagorean theorem with step-by-step explanations.
en.description: Our Pythagorean theorem calculator helps you find the missing side of a right triangle using the famous a² + b² = c² formula. Perfect for geometry students, architects, engineers, and anyone working with right triangles.
instructions: Select which side you want to calculate (a, b, or c)
Get instant calculation with the Pythagorean theorem

calculatorComponent.formula: a² + b² = c² (where c is the hypotenuse)
